item.title: DBS has been honored with the NTUC Women's Development Secretariat SG50 Special Award
item.description:
DBS Bank has been granted the NTUC Women’s Development Secretariat (WDS) SG50 Special Award as recognition for its committed flexible working program and employee support systems. These programs are designed to assist staff in improving their time management and balancing their work and personal responsibilities. Cheong Meng Foong, Managing Director of Group Human Resources – Reward, stated that DBS takes a comprehensive approach to create a workplace where employees feel empowered, connected, and valued...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dbs-has-been-honored-with-the-ntuc-women-s-development-secretariat-sg50-special-award/

item.title: Workaholic and Proud of IT
item.description:
If you’re deeply involved in technology, there’s a good chance you might identify as a workaholic. Did you know there’s a day specifically for acknowledging workaholics? It’s not an official holiday, of course, as that wouldn’t align with the workaholic spirit. Workaholics Day falls on July 5th, the day after most people are recovering from their Fourth of July festivities. While others are recovering from fireworks or tending to minor burns, you might find yourself busy with crucial hardware upgrades in a server room...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/workaholic-and-proud-of-it/
